snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton wasn’t speaking to reporters when she gave her 21-minute press conference earlier this week about her State Department emails. She was talking to Democratic voters and seeking to assure them that the controversy could be...
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton wasn’t speaking to reporters when she gave her 21-minute press conference earlier this week about her State Department emails. She was talking to Democratic voters and seeking to assure them that the controversy could be easily explained.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Seeks to Reassure Democrats on Email Controversy
